#summary MyFaces Integration Test
#labels Featured,Phase-Implementation

= Introduction =

- A Integration test unit for JSF (MyFaces implementation). In this case, the creation of a managed bean is tested: ("testBean").



= Details =

{{{
@HttpIntegrationConfigurationTest(port=9006, root="/test", src="src/main/resources/webapp/myfaces")


public class MyFacesTest extends AbstractMyFacesIntegrationTest {

	@Override
	public void test() throws Exception {

	super.assertManagedBeanNotNull("testBean");
	}
}
}}}
